pr_title: Otp2 add progress bar to bus route street matcher

timeline.message: Bugfix - The `BusRouteStreetMatcher` and `TransitToTaggedStopsModule` graph builder modules are not run if the graph is build in two steps. So, if you first build a _streetGraph.obj_ file, and the build the _graph.obj_ these modules are not run. The bug is independent of the config `matchBusRoutesToStreets` setting.

timeline.author: t2gran

timeline.message:
Update GraphBuilder.java

Made the `GraphBuilder` a bit more readable.
